tool_description: Lite version of Youtube Data API v3. Get Youtube data without any Youtube api key
name: Youtube v3 Lite
title: Youtube v3 Lite

api_list.name: Channel Videos/Playlists
api_list.description:
Get channel videos or playlists.
Quota cost is 1.

api_list.name: Trending/Charts
api_list.description:
Get Trending Videos list or Chart.
Quota cost is 1.

required_parameters.name: regionCode
required_parameters.description: ISO 3166-2 country code of the region. Like US (default), UK, CA, IN, etc.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
Get search results.
Quota cost is 1.

api_list.name: Comments
api_list.description:
Get comments list.
Quota cost is 1.

api_list.name: Playlist Items
api_list.description:
Get playlist items.
Quota cost is 1.

api_list.name: Playlists
api_list.description:
Get playlist details.
Quota cost is 1.

api_list.name: Related Videos
api_list.description:
Get related videos list.
Quota cost is 1.

api_list.name: Videos
api_list.description:
Get YouTube Video details.
Quota cost is 1. For statistics part, quota is +1.

api_list.name: Channels
api_list.description:
Get channel details.
Quota cost is 1.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description:
Channel Id. 
If channel id is not available, then provide `forUsername`

optional_parameters.name: forUsername
optional_parameters.description:
Channel username.
If channel username is not available, then provide `id`
